question: Which two countries traditional music form is "Tizita" ballad?
explanation: Tizita ballad is the traditional music form of Ethiopia and Eritrea. It follows qenet musical mode. Azmaris, the traditional Ethiopian minstrels who sings songs and tells stories, introduced the ballad form of Tizita. Aster Aweke, Bezawork Asfaw, Teddy Afro, Meklit Hadero, Mulatu Astatke are the famous proponents of the Tizita ballad music form.
